name: Finding the lost
description:
Set in a haunted mansion, you play as a detective. You have to find out the hidden keys, a secret code and escape the house until it's not too late.

Our team:

Programare: Orza Serban Rezus Bogdan Popa Maria Oprea Rares Cervinschi Mario Sincari Sebastian Vidami Alexandru Teodosie Codrin Scutaru Matei 

Arta: Oanea Raul Bardan Irina Ciurlica-Cretu Irina Lucan Cristina Strimbu Ana-Maria Bichir Medeea Miruna Design: Cazacu Andreea Maria Albu 

Muzica: Malos Alexandru Drumea Matei Pelinari Matei 

Testers: Domunco Stefan Bardan Irina
